column5: Hey guys just wondering where the no fishing zone and  c& r only zones are on the notty.. Lets say lookin at a map, is hwy 90 and north legal to fish ?  just dont want to get into any trouble just lookin for a little steel action ... ive never tried for them before so im new to their regs ..   thanks
The notty is open year round from the boyne down to the bay, between the boyne and the pine is C & R.  few days yet its way blown out.
